QuestData.Title: WANTED: Grondo's Bounty
QuestData.Description: Grondo, a mad gronn, has been seen roaming the Crackling Plains.$b$bThis beast has been killing entire herds of clefthoof and devouring innocent frost wolves. We must destroy this threat before it reaches the Garrison.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Grondo in the Crackling Plains.
QuestData.RewardText: Very good. We don't be needin' a gronn bearin' down on us before we get our defenses all established.
